If it weren’t black it’d be transparent all over. I thought maybe the thin package was vacuum packed when it arrived… it was not.
It’s a beautiful lightweight dress. Fabric is good as well.  My daughter loved it. Value for money.

It arrived overnight & was a lifesaver! We ordered 3 different dresses & I didn’t think that I was going to like the fit of this one I’m particular. It ended up being our favorite and the best fit of the 3 dresses! My daughter & I loved it! Highly recommend!

Granddaughter loved it. It's hard to gage clothing sizes for tweens since they are always growing and no one-size fits all for these girls. We went with the standard size for her, and I hope it lasts at least a season (year) We got the olive green

My daughter wore this dress for a special event and it was so pretty! We got the green and blue colors and she chose the green. Both were very pretty light colors.  It must have been comfortable because she only wears comfortable clothes.

Fits my daughter perfectly and is very pretty. Not sheer and she is tall for an 11-year-old (5'2) but it's still not too short. Not sure why we thought it was shorts on the inside but in case you do too it is a skirt. She'll just put shorts underneath

My daughter loves this dress. She is 5' 2" and it is a modest length on her though she still wears bike shorts underneath just in case. She spilled some mustard on it and it washed right out so I appreciate it not staining easily.

My 13 year old daughter loves this dress! She loves the ones that are shorter in the front & longer in the back so I knew she'd want this one. It's a nice quality, good materials & fabric, her favorite color, the fit is perfect & the 'flowiness' is great- which is a big factor for her! It will be super cute for Easter coming up, school and/or family functions & for pictures. She'll be wearing it any chance she gets to dress up! I would definitely recommend it!

I ordered this blibean Teen Girls Dresses as a gift for my daughter. This dress looks so nice on her! She loves the color, as do I. The dress fits as expected- I ordered the size 10-11 in a light blue. The materials is soft and comfortable, but will definitely crease and wrinkle easily. The stitching on the dress is great, no loose threads or holes to be seen. I'll add something to this review if issues arise after a washing. This is a nice dress and at $25 with a 25% coupon at the time of my review, it's a bargain! I would highly recommend it.
Beautiful color and flowy material. Perfect for our family beach photo shoot. Daughter is slightly taller than average 10.5 year old, ordered size 12 and it is perfect.
Love the material but my daughter doesn’t care about that. She only cares that it makes her feel like a princess and she never wants to take it off when she wears it. So win win.
Ordered for my niece. Color is beautiful, fabric is very nice feeling.  She loves the dress! Super cute. Fit is good!
The size and color are accurate and the dress is very comfortable. It’s stylish and comfortable and can be dressed up or down.

Very cute and nice enough to be dressy. She plans on wearing it for Christmas Eve. I like the ruffle detail at collar. The quality is pretty good overall. It is fairly thin material but hasn't shown to be see through. Fits her well/as expected for the size
Super cute, well made.

评论概述: Gorgeous and flowy - my 8 year olds new favorite dress.
评论详情: I'm going to get right to the point - my 8yo daughter loves this dress SO much that I've washed it 3 days in a row so she coudl wear it continuously.  The material is light and flowy, so be careful because the back is prone to snagging because it's so thin.Overall, the dress is beautiful.  The design is almost princess like with the long layer in the back being so light and airy, almost like a train (my daughter compared it to the Frozen II dress). I'd say it runs true to size for the most part. I ordered a size 10-11 for my 8yo who is wearing size 10 clothing and it fit nicely with some room to grow. I washed it in a delicated bag due to the light sheerness of part of the dress and hung it to dry. We're about 2 weeks into wearing this dress multiple times in a row and it's holding up decently well considering the feel of the fabric. You definitely don't need to save it for formal occasions as I can guarantee that most girls would love to wear it as an everyday dress.
